snippet: The new infections were a reminder that the Ebola crisis that has ravaged West Africa is far from over.
abstract: Health officials say two relief workers in Sierra Leone, one from American medical aid organization Partners In Health and one from British military, have been infected with deadly Ebola virus.

byline.original: By SHERI FINK and ALAN COWELL
byline.contributor: Denise Grady and Rick Gladstone contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The new infections were a reminder that the Ebola crisis that has ravaged West Africa is far from over.

headline.main: American and British Aid Workers Infected With Ebola in Sierra Leone
headline.print_headline: 2 Aid Workers in West Africa Are Infected With Virus
